patthana8.52:4.1: Nakilesasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana8.52:5.1: Nakilesavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.52:6.1: Nakilesasampayuttañca nakilesavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakilesasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana8.52:7.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … vipāke ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
